category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 5 (Safety and Health Policy)
contents: Article 5 (Safety and Health Policy) ① The chairman establishes a safety and health policy to establish a safety and health management system necessary to prevent disasters and accidents, and this policy contains the chairman's management policy and goals regarding safety and health and performance improvement. ② All workers within the Corporation shall comply with the safety and health policies stipulated in relevant laws and regulations and these regulations, and shall actively cooperate with all measures regarding accident and disaster prevention implemented by the Corporation.
